summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Music Genre Exploration and Quiz Bot. All backend API endpoints working correctly, frontend loads with proper dark theme, Spotify OAuth integration functional, and protected routes redirect appropriately.
passed_tests: Backend API health check at /api/ returns 200 with correct status message
Spotify auth login URL endpoint /api/auth/spotify-login returns valid Spotify auth_url
Leaderboard endpoint /api/leaderboard returns empty leaderboard array
Protected endpoints properly return 401 without authentication
Landing page renders with Music Quiz Bot title and proper data-testid attributes
Deep ocean teal dark theme (bg-deep-ocean) properly applied
Spotify login button clickable and initiates OAuth flow correctly
Feature cards display correctly (Genre Guess, Artist Guess, Mood Quiz)
Protected route /hub redirects to landing page when not logged in
Protected route /leaderboard redirects to landing page when not logged in
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Biolum-cyan accent colors present throughout the interface
